group_1.textRight: (They've got connections with all sorts of Magical@Girls, after all...)
(And besides, the situation outside of Kamihama is@better known to the recently arrived Coordinators...)

group_1.textLeft: Welcome, Miss Natsu.
Come, miss. This way, please.
How can I help you? You are all out of breath.
It seems as though you have been in such a state@of haste that your clothing has been soiled.
Your hair is in disarray, as well. If you don't mind,@please let me fix it for you.
After all, you are a fine lady too, Miss Natsu.
Oh, right. Would you like a cup of coffee?
If I remember correctly, Miss Natsu, you like it@hot.
Please wait a moment, it's coming right up.
H-how can I help you, miss? Did I do something@discourteous?
Have I... made a "mistake", again...?
Notebook... My notebook...

group_1.textRight: Oh, no, my bad. I wasn't mad.

group_1.textLeft: That is a relief to hear.

group_1.textRight: So, uh, I didn't come here to get adjusted today.

group_1.textLeft: ...Then, you heard the rumour about my new@sweets...?

group_1.textRight: I came here today to ask about her.

group_1.textLeft: Certainly, miss.

group_1.textRight: D'ya know anything about her past?
You're an Coordinator, you must've heard@something, right?!
C'mon, buddy, you're my only hope!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, but... we cannot divulge a person's past@simply for the fun of it.

group_1.textRight: I seriously... seriously want to save her!
I want her to... find peace of mind...@so she can sleep!
Uhh... Hey, want me to clean this car for you?

group_1.textLeft: No thanks, miss. I did it this morning.

group_1.textRight: It's hard to find stores around here, right?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed, which is why I purchased as much as@I could carry yesterday.

group_1.textRight: A-anything is okay! Isn't there anything you need@at all?

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*...
It's useless, no matter how much you try to@flatter me...
I do not know anything about Miss Suzuka's past.
However, it appears that your enthusiasm has@rubbed off on her.
Ranka Chizu.
A Magical Girl from Futatsugi, just like Sakuya.
I just happened to be here today to get adjusted,@but...
Y'all were makin’ a fuss just when we're 'boutta@say hi.
Done lost the timin’, on that.
...That girl, she's been kinda sick lately, right?
Okay. I'll give you an answer about what happened@in Futatsugi.
Well, it's nothing to hide anyway.
...Us Futatsugi Magical Girls were, well, divided@into three factions at war.
It was a long and fierce war... so much that we@call it the "Bloody Tragedy."
The final battle, the one that led us to Kamihama,@was particularly intense.
A lot of Magical Girls died, friend and foe alike.
Well, we've always had a lot of conflicts.
There were killings every now and then, and we@all got used to it.
But since that time, Sakuya's behaviour has@certainly changed a bit.
So, perhaps, she was...
Maybe, she was a little too sensitive to live in@Futatsugi...
